title: Greentea OS
coming-soon_we-are-working: We are working very hard on the new version of our site. It will bring a lot of new features. Stay tuned!
about-us: Greentea OS is a fork of ReactOS, a free Windows-compatible operating system, written from scratch, but more user and production oriented (than ReactOS itself). We would first make it *actually* usable for day-to-day use.
footer_made-by: Cooming soon page created by Greentea OS team and contributors. Green tea is like coffee, Greentea is like OS. GreenTeaOS is fine too :)
